tossup_question: -   –  What phase of a star's lifetime on the HR diagram involves a hydrogen shell burning around an inert helium core?
bonus_question: -   –  The reasons why the Earth’s core is believed to be largely molten iron do not include arguments that involve which of following?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Density of iron
X) Conductivity of iron
Y) Magnetic properties of iron
Z) Abundance of iron in the universe
bonus_answer: ANSWER:  Y) MAGNETIC PROPERTIES OF IRON
